title: Am I a bad person for eating veal (baby cow)? - Quora

response.answer_text: You might find this an interesting read:Summary of the Veal Industry in Canada“One common misconception is that veal is from very young calves. Many people chose not to eat veal because they believe the calves are sent to market at only a few weeks old. In reality, veal is the second oldest animal we eat next to beef.”
